'''15w31b''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on July 30, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/07/minecraft-snapshot-15w31a/</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes from [[15w31a]], including an important one regarding books and signs.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Splash water bottle]]s'''
* Can be used to put out fires, temporarily creating a little water puddle.

=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|/clear}} '''
* Now clears the offhand slot.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Status effect]]s'''
* {{EffectLink|Levitation}}:
** Can no longer induce people from being kicked from [[server]]s.
* {{EffectLink|Glowing}}:
** The details on [[item]] models are now highlighted completely while held, instead of being just a box.
** Worn [[armor]] and held items get highlighted with the corresponding team color, instead of overriding them.
